name.jp: カード破壊防止の巻物

description.en: Prevents a card from being destroyed when an upgrade fails.
description.ar: Prevents a card from being destroyed when an upgrade fails.
description.br: Previne a destruição da carta caso o aprimoramento falhe.
description.cns: 当卡片升级失败时可以防止卡片被摧毁。
description.de: Verhindert das Zerstören einer Karte, wenn diese aufgewertet wird.
description.fi: Prevents a card from being destroyed when an upgrade fails.
description.fil: Prevents a card from being destroyed when an upgrade fails.
description.fr: Empêche une carte d'être détruite lorsqu'une tentative d'amélioration échoue.
description.id: Mencegah kartu dihancurkan saat peningkatan gagal.
description.it: Prevents a card from being destroyed when an upgrade fails.
description.jp: 失敗してもカードの消失を1回だけ防止してくれる巻物。成功・失敗に関わらず消費します。（通称: EProtect）
description.kr: 소켓 카드 업그레이드 시, 파괴되지 않도록 보호 해 준다.
description.nl: Prevents a card from being destroyed when an upgrade fails.
description.pl: Prevents a card from being destroyed when an upgrade fails.
description.ru: Защищает карту от разрушения при неудачной попытке улучшения.
description.sp: Previene que se destruya una carta cuando falla la mejora.
description.sw: Prevents a card from being destroyed when an upgrade fails.
description.th: ป้องกันไม่ให้การ์ดถูกทำลายเมื่อการอัพเกรดล้มเหลว
description.tw: 當鑲嵌卡片轉換失敗時可防止卡片被破壞
description.vi: Ngăn thẻ bị phá hủy khi nâng cấp không thành công.
